name: PublishToPyPI
description: Create and upload a Python package to a Python Package Index using twine.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: PyPI connection
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select a generic service endpoint containing PyPI connection details. 

To create a new generic service endpoint, go to Settings -> Service endpoints -> New Service Endpoint -> Generic. 

Connection Name – Use a friendly connection name of your choice. 
Server URL – The PyPI package server URL (for example: https://upload.pypi.org/legacy/). 
User Name – The PyPI registered username. 
Password – The password for your PyPI account.

inputs.name: wd
inputs.label: Python package directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory of the Python package to be created and published, where setup.py is present.

inputs.name: wheel
inputs.label: Also publish a wheel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether to create and publish a universal wheel package (platform independent) in addition to an sdist package. [More information](https://packaging.python.org/tutorials/distributing-packages/#wheels).
